name: Rosemary Conditioner For Thinning Hair
about: What it is: Treatment Conditioner with Rosemary Oil, Plant Proteins + Essential Ceramides to help strengthen hair. Signature scent of Rosemary. Dermatologist-Tested...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Anti-Aging.- Thinning.- Color Safe..Key Benefits: - Helps strengthen hair.- Helps minimize breakage.- Helps restore the protective scalp barrier..Highlighted Ingredients:- Pure Rosemary Oil: Helps minimize hair thinning..- Five Proteins (Plant): Helps protect hair from breakage..- Five Ceramides (AG/AP/EOP/NG/NP): Helps restore the protective scalp barrier...What Else You Need to Know: A strengthening conditioner for scalp and hair. Pure Rosemary Oil and 5 Plant Proteins helps strengthen hair and minimize breakage. 5 Essential Ceramides (AG/AP/EOP/NG/NP) helps restore the protective scalp barrier. Dermatologist-Tested. Hypoallergenic. Non-Comedogenic. Color-Safe. Use with Rosemary Shampoo for best results...Fragrance Description: Pure Rosemary Oil is paired with fine fragrance notes of mandarin, jasmine and cedarwood....Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency....Allure
ingredients: - Pure Rosemary Oil: Helps minimize hair thinning..- Five Proteins (Plant): Helps protect hair from breakage..- Five Ceramides (AG/AP/EOP/NG/NP): Helps restore the protective scalp barrier....Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Water, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Protein, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Ceramide AP, Ceramide AG, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NP, Ceramide NG, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Butylene Glycol, Cholesterol, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sucrose Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Oleic Acid, Dextran, Dipropylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Stearic Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glyceryl Caprylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Linalool.                     .......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use as your regular conditioner on wash day..-After shampooing, apply from root to tip..-Leave in for one to two minutes..-Rinse well..-Pairs well with Rosemary Shampoo (sold separately).... Recycling Instructions:.-Necessaire has partnered with How2Recycle to provide third-party verified recycling claims. The bottle is 100 percent bio-resin HDPE. The cap is mixed material. The bottle can be recycled via US and Canada curbside. The carton and insert are made with FSC-Certified, PCR Kraft Board. They can be recycled with paper via US and Canada curbside. Necessaire is a Certified B Corp, Certified Climate Neutral, Certified Plastic Neutral, Certified FSC, a How2Reycycle Partner, and a One Percent for the Planet Member, donating one percent of all sales to environmental nonprofits fighting to defend our air, land, water, and wildlife worldwide. When you shop Necessaire, the full carbon and plastic footprint has been offset by the brand.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from skeepers and Necessaire in exchange for my honest review.u201d I have been using the Necessaire Rosemary Shampoo and I absolutely loved it. After using this product my hair feels noticeably softer and smoother. Itu2019s contains a blend of natural ingredients that contribute to its effectiveness. One key ingredient stand out for me is rosemary oil, which is known for its soothing and stimulating properties. It also contains other beneficial ingredients like aloe vera, vitamin B5, and vegetable-derived cleansers. These ingredients work together to cleanse the hair, promote scalp health, and leave your locks feeling nourished. itu2019s not only provides a refreshing scent but also helps to soothe and stimulate the scalp.

reviews.review_title: Rinses clean and does what it says!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shampoo and conditioner. I bought it with my own money. It was a blind buy as I bought it the first day it launched on the sephora website. The shampoo..It leaves the hair clean but not dry. The conditioner has a good amount of slip. Scent is light.

Iu2019ve been wanting to write a review since the ones so far are incentivized so I couldnu2019t get a good read on whether or not this product would be worth it. The bottle is cute - nice color and I love the squeeze nozzle so I donu2019t use too much product. Where it lacks though is there is no slip. It was still very hard to section and comb my hair and after the shower it was more tangled than it usually is. It left my hair feeling dry and wanting more moisture. The smell is fantastic and the ingredients are clean however it isnu2019t what my hair needs so Iu2019ll be returning this item.   squeeze was great, it helped me not use too much product. This product smelled really good, however it didnu2019t give me the slip that I was hoping for. It left my hair feeling very dried and de tangled.

reviews.review_text: I am loving this product! The scent is amazing and it leaves my hair so soft and smooth. This is my first time trying Necessaire and I am very pleased with the results, especially when paired with the shampoo.

reviews.review_title: Dare I say life changing?! YES!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! I have only loved one other conditioner for thinning hair, but this one is $20 cheaper, so score! I bleach my hair, so I need more than the ultralight conditioning that is usually offered & this is perfect. Very conditioning, but still not too heavy. My poor fine hair felt like straight straw after refreshing my bleach & one use of this completely transformed my parched hair! It feels so soft, silky & healthy again, I literally cannot believe it! I was seriously mind blown & made my husband run his fingers through my hair. lol Iu2019ve also had noticeably less fallout in the shower, which is amazing! The rosemary/eucalyptus scent is nice & refreshing & the clean ingredients are very appreciated. Love the packaging & twist cap too. I just canu2019t recommend this enough!

reviews.review_text: Gifted from Necessaire. Necessaire Rosemary Conditioner is a must-have for anyone struggling with thinning hair. I recommend this to anyone who is experiencing hair thinning, damaged hair or needs to strengthen their hair follicles then, this conditioner is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hello everyone I was gifted the necessarie Rosemary conditioner from the Skeepers app. Scent: When I used the conditioner I instantly smelled rosemary, but mixed with a mint menthol scent. I thought, that since it had menthol in it, it might irritate my scalp but did the opposite. The conditioner gave my scalp and cooling feeling, and felt less irritated. Review: When pressing the bottle, to get the conditioner out, the texture is a cream. I thought since it had a thick cream texture it would hydrate my ends. When I was down rising out my hair, my ends felt still dry. I thought it would hydrate my hair since it said stronger, that part is true I have bleached hair and my hair strands did feel not as weak to break apart, but my hair was getting a little tangled. I decided to go in with a three-minute hair mask on one side, and not the other to see if it was due to the conditioner. The results were the side I did use the hair mask, was softer and easy to brush meanwhile the side with only the necessaire conditioner was hard to brush through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Necessaire Rosemary Conditioner for free from Skeepers and Necessaire in exchange for my honest review. I first want to talk about the amazing packaging. You simply twist the cap, turn the bottle upside down, and squeeze the product you want out. No mess, no waste, just perfection! The product itself is a creamy formula. I normally always have to use at a minimum double the amount of shampoo in conditioner to cover my entire hair to properly moisturize my hair after shampooing. With this product I could use way less. This is truly a highlight of the product. This product is highly scented. It has a fresh earthy Rosemary scent. If you have an aversion to this scent, you will not like this product. I have naturally dry very curly hair. I normally leave a little conditioner in my hair to comb through my hair after showering. However because of the scent I felt like I had to wash everything out. This is a really great product. I hope they make another version in a fruity scent in the future.
